title: Ka thla lo kal la Lal fak teh
lyrics:
Ka thla, lo kal la, Lal fak teh,
A thisenin a tlan chhuak che,
I kawlpui a khen thlak sak che kha,
Chhandamna hmunah a la che.

Chhandamna hmun, hmun ralmuang chu,
Chhandamna hmun, thil thlawn pek hlu,
Chutah kan fakna chho rawh se,
Chhandamna hmunah min tlan e.

Ka Lal hnen ata ka bo hla,
A duhzawng fel pawh ka do kha;
Tunah amah fakin ka awm,
Chhandamna hmunah min Lal ka lawm.

Pathianin kraws min entir khan,
A khawngaihna ropui alang;
Kawl a tla, thla a zalen ta,
Chhandamna hmunah a hla ka sa.

Ka thil tha eng mah ka ring lo,
Aman rin zawk tur a siam zo;
Keimahah tha an hmu lo vang,
Chhandamna hmunah lo kha chuan.

Thla chau, chawlhna hetah zawng la,
Damna lawm la, i thawveng ang,
Isua tlawm kha an chawimawi a,
Chhandamna hmunah min lawm a.
